verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> shir A Song מִ֝זְמוֹר <S%H4210><s%> Miz-mor [and] Psalm לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> liv-nei- for the sons קֹֽרַח׃ <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach. of Korah גָּ֘ד֤וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol Great יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [is] the LORD וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל <S%H1984><s%> u-me-hul-Lal to be praised מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; and greatly בְּעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> be-'Ir in the city אֱ֝לֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, of our God הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- [in] the mountain קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho. of his holiness

אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God בְּאַרְמְנוֹתֶ֗יהָ <S%H759><s%> be-'ar-me-no-Tei-ha, in her palaces נוֹדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> no-Da' is known לְמִשְׂגָּֽב׃ <S%H4869><s%> le-mis-Gav. for a refuge

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh lo הַ֭מְּלָכִים <S%H4428><s%> Ham-me-la-chim For lo the kings נֽוֹעֲד֑וּ <S%H3259><s%> no-'a-Du; were assembled עָבְר֥וּ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-ve-Ru they passed by יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav. together

הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah They רָ֭אוּ <S%H7200><s%> Ra-'u They saw כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken then תָּמָ֑הוּ <S%H8539><s%> ta-Ma-hu; [it and] so they marvelled נִבְהֲל֥וּ <S%H926><s%> niv-ha-Lu they were troubled נֶחְפָּֽזוּ׃ <S%H2648><s%> nech-Pa-zu. [and] hasted away

רְ֭עָדָה <S%H7461><s%> Re-'a-dah Fear אֲחָזָ֣תַם <S%H270><s%> 'a-cha-Za-tam took hold שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham; there חִ֝֗יל <S%H2427><s%> Chil, upon them there [and] pain כַּיּוֹלֵֽדָה׃ <S%H3205><s%> kai-yo-Le-dah. as of a woman in travail

בְּר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> be-Ru-ach wind קָדִ֑ים <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim; with an east תְּ֝שַׁבֵּ֗ר <S%H7665><s%> te-shab-Ber, Thou breakest אֳנִיּ֥וֹת <S%H591><s%> o-ni-Yot the ships תַּרְשִֽׁישׁ׃ <S%H8659><s%> tar-Shish. of Tarshish

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher we שָׁמַ֨עְנוּ׀ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-nu As we have heard כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so רָאִ֗ינוּ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-nu, so have we seen בְּעִיר־ <S%H5892><s%> be-'ir- in the city יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God צְ֭בָאוֹת <S%H6635><s%> Tze-va-'ot of hosts בְּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> be-'Ir in the city אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; of our God אֱלֹ֘הִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God יְכוֹנְנֶ֖הָ <S%H3559><s%> ye-chon-Ne-ha will establish עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- it for עוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam ever סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

דִּמִּ֣ינוּ <S%H1819><s%> dim-Mi-nu We have thought אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> chas-De-cha; of thy lovingkindness בְּ֝קֶ֗רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev, in the midst הֵיכָלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1964><s%> hei-cha-Le-cha. of thy temple

כְּשִׁמְךָ֤ <S%H8034><s%> ke-shim-Cha According to thy name אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, O God כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken So תְּ֭הִלָּתְךָ <S%H8416><s%> Te-hil-la-te-cha so [is] thy praise עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto קַצְוֵי־ <S%H7099><s%> katz-vei- unto the ends אֶ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz; of the earth צֶ֝֗דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek, of righteousness מָלְאָ֥ה <S%H4390><s%> mal-'Ah is full יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-Ne-cha. thy right hand

יִשְׂמַ֤ח׀ <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach rejoice הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- Let mount צִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon, Zion תָּ֭גֵלְנָה <S%H1523><s%> Ta-ge-le-nah be glad בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> be-Not let the daughters יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah לְ֝מַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an, Because מִשְׁפָּטֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4941><s%> mish-pa-Tei-cha. because of thy judgments

סֹ֣בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> Sob-bu Walk about צִ֭יּוֹן <S%H6726><s%> Tzi-yon Zion וְהַקִּיפ֑וּהָ <S%H5362><s%> ve-hak-ki-Fu-ha; and go round about סִ֝פְר֗וּ <S%H5608><s%> sif-Ru, her tell מִגְדָּלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H4026><s%> mig-da-Lei-ha. the towers

שִׁ֤יתוּ <S%H7896><s%> Shi-tu Mark לִבְּכֶ֨ם׀ <S%H3820><s%> lib-be-Chem ye well לְֽחֵילָ֗ה <S%H2430><s%> le-chei-Lah, her bulwarks פַּסְּג֥וּ <S%H6448><s%> pas-se-Gu consider אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H759><s%> ar-me-no-Tei-ha; her palaces לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an that תְּ֝סַפְּר֗וּ <S%H5608><s%> te-sap-pe-Ru, that ye may tell לְד֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> le-Dor [it] to the generation אַחֲרֽוֹן׃ <S%H314><s%> a-cha-Ron. following

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki For זֶ֨ה׀ <S%H2088><s%> zeh such אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him For this God אֱ֭לֹהֵינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'E-lo-hei-nu [is] our God עוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam for ever וָעֶ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> va-'Ed; and ever ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He יְנַהֲגֵ֣נוּ <S%H5090><s%> ye-na-ha-Ge-nu he will be our guide עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- until מֽוּת׃ <S%H4192><s%> Mut.
